Container.Name: FlareSolverr
Container.Overview: Proxy server to bypass Cloudflare protection
Container.Description: FlareSolverr is a proxy server to bypass Cloudflare protection.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Verbosity of the logging. Use LOG_LEVEL=debug for more information.

Config.Name: Log HTML
Config.Description: Only for debugging. If true all HTML that passes through the proxy will be logged to the console in debug level.

Config.Name: Captcha Solver
Config.Description: Captcha solving method. It is used when a captcha is encountered. See https://github.com/FlareSolverr/FlareSolverr#captcha-solvers

Config.Name: TimeZone
Config.Description: Timezone used in the logs and the web browser. Example: TZ=Europe/London.

Config.Name: Headless
Config.Description: Only for debugging. To run the web browser in headless mode or visible.

Config.Name: Captcha Directory
Config.Description: The folder to modify captcha poviders.
